name: Alien planet underwater research (vz200)
description:
Another port from zx spectrum to vz200. If you liked my games "Alien planet underwater research" and "Alien planet underwater research Sea of horror" now you can try vz200 port of first game. Due to machine limitations some content was removed. In this game you are exploring huge alien ocean to find a chest with unknown treasure.
Controls:
q-up,a-down,o-left,p-right.
